groups.title: ICANDELO A: IZINCOKO
groups.instructions: Khetha isihloko sibesiNYE kwezi zilandelayo ubhale ngaso. Bhala amagama angama-340–390.

questions.text: Isiphumo sihambelana nesenzo hayi iminqweno yodwa

questions.context: Qwalasela uze ukhethe ubemNYE kwimifanekiso engezantsi wandule ukubhala isincoko esinesihloko esifanelekileyo. Nombola impendulo yakho ngolu hlobo (1.7 OKANYE 1.8).
Qwalasela uze ukhethe ubemNYE kwimifanekiso engezantsi wandule ukubhala isincoko esinesihloko esifanelekileyo. Nombola impendulo yakho ngolu hlobo (1.7 OKANYE 1.8).

groups.title: ICANDELO B: IMIHLATHI
groups.instructions: Khetha imihlathi ibeMIBINI kule ilandelayo uze ubhale ngayo. Bhala amagama ali-100–120 (umxholo kuphela).

questions.text: ILETA YOBUHLOBO: Bhala ileta eya kumhlobo wakho ucele indawo yokuhlala ngethuba usafuna umsebenzi kwidolophu ahlala kuyo.
INTETHO ESESIKWENI: Bhala intetho yokukhuthaza nokomeleza abafundi bebanga le-12.
questions.scenario: Isikolo esikwingingqi yakho siza kubanenkonzo yokukhuthaza nokomeleza abafundi abaza kuhlalela iimviwo. Uchongiwe njengesithethi esimele abafundi.
Ulilungu leforam yokugcina ucwangco kwingingqi yakho, kusweleke ipolisa ebelizinikele emsebenzini walo kule foram.

questions.text: ILETA EYA KUMHLELI: Bhala ileta eya kumhleli uphalaze izimvo zakho ngendlela exazalala ekulahlwa ngayo inkunkuma kwiindawo ezingafanelekanga.
IRIVYU: Bhala irivyu yefilim okanye umdlalo weqonga utyhile izinto ezinokuzuzwa nezinokususwa ukuze ikulungele ukufundisa.
questions.scenario: Uceliwe ngumpapashi ukuba uphawule ngefilim okanye ngomdlalo weqonga ekulungiselelwa ukuba uyokudlalwa ezikolweni.

questions.text: INQAKU LEPHEPHANDABA: Bhala inqaku lephephandaba uncoma izakhono zolutsha zokukhetha imixholo, ukukhula kwetalente nobuchule bokusebenzisa ulwimi kwezi jenre.
questions.scenario: Ungumgwebi kukhuphiswano lokubhala iijenre ezahlukileyo; njengamabali amafutshane, isihobe, iinoveli needrama.
